faqs.answer: Yes, it offers affordable rents, good connectivity, and growing commercial activity.

faqs.answer: Office spaces generally range from 4 Marla to 14 Marla depending on availability.

faqs.answer: Yes, the area is popular among startups due to flexible rental options.

faqs.answer: Yes, all rental listings are verified before being listed.
